description: Unique identifier for this driver–equipment occupancy record.
Timestamp of the assignment/event, in yyyymmddHHMMssSSS format with millisecond precision; time zone not explicit—confirm.
Likely indicates whether the occupant is an internal employee (True/False); confirm with SME.
Free-text passenger name when not linked to an employee; empty if captured via employee ID.
Optional notes about the trip or assignment.
Identifier of the equipment or vehicle involved in the record.
Entity/table discriminator for the equipment ID, enabling polymorphic references; confirm expected values.
Employee identifier for the passenger when they are staff; 0 or null if none.
Entity/table discriminator for the passenger’s employee ID; confirm expected values.
Employee identifier of the assigned driver; 0 or null if not set.
Entity/table discriminator for the driver ID used to resolve the foreign key.
Role of the person in the vehicle for this record (for example, driver or passenger).
Original record identifier from the source system, kept for lineage and reconciliation.
Name of the source system table from which this record was migrated.
